original_text: They have done very many bad things. Their sins have reached as high as heaven. God has remembered to punish them. They have done very many bad things.
korean_text: 그의 죄는 하늘에 사무쳤으며 하나님은 그의 불의한 일을 기억하신지라

sentences.original_text: They have done very many bad things.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 매우 많은 나쁜 일을 저질렀습니다.

sentences.original_text: Their sins have reached as high as heaven.
God has remembered to punish them.
They have done very many bad things.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 매우 많은 나쁜 일을 저질렀습니다.
